00027 class GaussianKernel
00028 {
00029  public:
00033   GaussianKernel() : bandwidth(1.0), gamma(-0.5)
00034   { }
00035 
00041   GaussianKernel(double bandwidth) :
00042     bandwidth(bandwidth),
00043     gamma(-0.5 * pow(bandwidth, -2.0))
00044   { }
00045 
00057   template<typename VecType>
00058   double Evaluate(const VecType& a, const VecType& b) const
00059   {
00060     // The precalculation of gamma saves us a little computation time.
00061     return exp(gamma * metric::SquaredEuclideanDistance::Evaluate(a, b));
00062   }
00063 
00071   double Evaluate(double t) const
00072   {
00073     // The precalculation of gamma saves us a little computation time.
00074     return exp(gamma * t * t);
00075   }
00076 
00078   const double& Bandwidth() const { return bandwidth; }
00080   const double& Gamma() const { return gamma; }
00081 
00082  private:
00084   double bandwidth;
00085 
00088   double gamma;
00089 };
